name: Ich Bin Ein Berliner
description:
Play as a Berliner (typical German jelly-filled pastry) who decided to subway surf because he forgot his ticket. He has 60 seconds to make it to the next station. Can he make it without being pierced by angry forks or falling off the carriage?

Credits

A game by Marie Wispler

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game a Week"  (Winter Semester 2020/2021)
